# Raven-HLS

Raven is an open player of HLS streams inspired by the youtube video player

![Built With Stencil](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Built%20With%20Stencil-16161d.svg?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BCjxzdHlsZSB0eXBlPSJ0ZXh0L2NzcyI%2BCgkuc3Qwe2ZpbGw6I0ZGRkZGRjt9Cjwvc3R5bGU%%2BCg%3D%3D&colorA=16161d&style=flat-square)

## Motiovation

Raven is one of the components used in TNS projects. When developing crows, we tried to adhere to 4 ‚Äúbe‚Äù principles. Raven should be the best solution to the problem.

### Be simple

Raven should be easy to install and use, both for developers and users.

### Be modern

ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

### Be universal

ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

### Be accessible

ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

## Features

- **WIP** In the process of work.
- **planned** The discussion is over, expect.
- **discuss** The need for this functionality is considered

| Feature       | Description                                        | Status  |
| ------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| It's alive!   | Minimum working prototype                          | WIP     |
| Setup CI/CD   | Support for continuous integration and deployment. | planned |
| npm deploy    | Availability in npm                                | planned |
| React support | The ability to use raven as a react component      | planned |

## How to contribute to Raven?

At the moment, North Syndicate does not accept contributions from third-party developers.
